headlines.title: Japan Flexes Its Military Muscle at China, and Trump
headlines.description: A highly visible missile base on Okinawa is part of a Japanese defense buildup made amid fears of Beijing’s growing power and questions about U.S. commitment.

headlines.title: New questions emerge from the new charges in Kilmar Abrego Garcia case
headlines.description: The sudden return of Kilmar Abrego Garcia to the United States on Friday to face federal charges of smuggling migrants across the country was a messaging triumph for the Trump administration.

headlines.title: Trump to Send National Guard to LA to Quell Immigration Protests: Live Updates
headlines.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom called the decision to call in National Guard forces “purposefully inflammatory.” The president’s order came on the second day of protests and clashes over federal immigration raids in Los Angeles.

headlines.title: Colombia presidential candidate shot in head
headlines.description: The opposition senator was hit three times during rally in Bogota and is in a critical condition in hospital.

headlines.title: NASA is launching a $488 million mission with its new telescope, which is expected to provide a lot of data.
headlines.description: NASA's ambitious SPHEREx telescope project represents a significant leap forward in our understanding of the cosmos. With a price tag of $488 million, this revolutionary instrument is designed to create an unprecedented three-dimensional map of our universe. The Spectro-Photometer for the History of the Universe, Epoch of Reionization and Ices…

headlines.title: San Antonio’s next mayor is Air Force veteran Gina Ortiz Jones
headlines.description: The progressive West Side native fended off roughly $1 million in attacks from Texas Republicans trying to elect Abbott ally Rolando Pablos.

headlines.title: Decker manhunt: Officials reopen Icicle River area
headlines.description: Decker, who is believed to be armed and highly skilled in survival, has been the subject of an intensive multi-agency manhunt across Washington state.

headlines.title: Sovereignty Wins 2025 Belmont Stakes, Beats Journalism in Final Triple Crown Leg
headlines.description: Sovereignty won the 157th Belmont Stakes on Saturday, finishing just ahead of the favorite Journalism to win another jewel of the Triple Crown.

headlines.title: Trump deploys 2,000 National Guard members after Los Angeles immigration protests
headlines.description: President Donald Trump has deployed 2,000 National Guard members in California after the Los Angeles immigration protests, the White House said.

headlines.title: Ukraine war briefing: Putin yet to retaliate in full force over Operation Spiderweb, officials say
headlines.description: Diplomat predicts ‘huge, vicious and unrelenting’ assault, though a Russia expert thinks Moscow is unable to escalate much beyond current level of attacks. What we know on day 1,201
